main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed on 8 April 1961, initially appearing as a meteor with a greenish tail.
interesting points: The object was tracked on radar and visually observed for approximately 5 minutes., The object decreased in elevation before increasing again., The observer speculated that the object might have been a satellite., The sighting was considered significant due to the good visual and radar track., The object was listed as an unidentified aerial object.
sighted object: unidentified aerial object resembling a meteor
witness description: were military personnel with significant flight experience
